archimate:Requirement.name: SC-7(12): Boundary Protection | Host-based Protection
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Implement [Assignment: organization-defined host-based boundary protection mechanisms] at [Assignment: organization-defined system components].

properties.value: Host-based boundary protection mechanisms include host-based firewalls. System components that employ host-based boundary protection mechanisms include servers, workstations, notebook computers, and mobile devices.
